code:
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-

from odoo import models


class Website(models.Model):
    _inherit = 'website'

    def sale_product_domain(self):
        # remove product event from the website content grid and list view (not removed in detail view)
        return ['&'] + super(Website, self).sale_product_domain() + [('event_ok', '=', False)]
comments: coding  utf 8        remove product event website content grid list view (not removed detail view)
content:
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-

from odoo import models


class Website(models.Model):
    _inherit = 'website'

    def sale_product_domain(self):
        # remove product event from the website content grid and list view (not removed in detail view)
        return ['&'] + super(Website, self).sale_product_domain() + [('event_ok', '=', False)]
